title: Globe Institute Progressive Relaxation Calm Sleep Guided Meds
description:
Globe Institute - Progressive Relaxation and Calm Sleep Guided Meditations [FLAC]

David Gibson and Diane Hough

These tracks incorporate music inspired by Spirit, and uses music production techniques that have been shown in research to create specific emotional effects.

Progressive Relaxation - 22:26 - Diane takes you deeper and deeper, into a state of complete relaxation. This track, "Awakening" with Cello and Harp is in the background. This track has binaural beats that transition from Theta to Delta to enhance the relaxation process.

Calm Sleep - 17:38 - Diane takes you down to a state of deep peace and relaxation so you can gently drift off into a peaceful sleep. The "Calm Sleep" track is in the background, which incorporates Binaural Beats in Delta to entrain you into calm sleep.

reference libFLAC 1.3.1 20141125
